challenges.name: Early Bird
challenges.description: Every note is shifted slightly early

challenges.name: Later Gator
challenges.description: Every note is shifted slightly late

challenges.name: Broken Tape
challenges.description: Half of arrows are shifted either late or early.

challenges.name: Bombardment
challenges.description: Random speedy arrows will spawn

challenges.name: Overclock
challenges.description: Everything is sped up

challenges.name: Supersonic
challenges.description: Spawned arrows move faster

challenges.name: High Pressure
challenges.description: Miss and Stinky ): score lowered

challenges.name: Opposite Day
challenges.description: All positive feedback is in reverse order, Miss unaffected

challenges.name: Outage
challenges.description: Severity based chance for each upgrade to be disabled for the round

challenges.name: Graveyard
challenges.description: Spawned arrows start invisible and increase in visibility as they approach

challenges.name: Shattered Sword
challenges.description: Permanently removes the last upgrade received

challenges.name: The Curse
challenges.description: Higher chance of future challenges having increased severity

challenges.name: The Middle Path
challenges.description: No Perfects, no Misses

challenges.name: The Great Below
challenges.description: Start the next song with negative points

challenges.name: Death Beam
challenges.description: One random direction has increased arrow speed

challenges.name: Subterfuge
challenges.description: Random directions for each spawned arrow, 15% of song per severity level

challenges.name: Frosty
challenges.description: Some spawned arrows are now non-scoring freeze effect arrows

challenges.name: Short Circuit
challenges.description: Some spawned arrows are now non-scoring lightning effect arrows

challenges.name: Blaze
challenges.description: Some spawned arrows are now non-scoring fire effect arrows

challenges.name: Elemental Chaos
challenges.description: Some spawned arrows are now non-scoring elemental effect arrows

challenges.name: Pandora's Box
challenges.description: Severity effects are more intense for the rest of the game

challenges.name: Detour
challenges.description: One random direction is closed, arrows redirected to random other direction
